SEARCH
Package Camp

Class CampDate

java.lang.Object
Camp.CampDate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CampDate extends Object implements Serializable
The `CampDate` class represents important dates associated with a camp, including the start date, end date, and registration deadline. It provides methods to get and set these dates.
See Also:
